## RumInitConfiguration.sessionReplaySampleRate property

The percentage of tracked sessions with <a href="https://www.datadoghq.com/pricing/?product=real-user-monitoring--session-replay#real-user-monitoring--session-replay">Browser RUM & Session Replay pricing</a> features: 100 for all, 0 for none. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/guide/sampling-browser-plans">Configure Your Setup For Browser RUM and Browser RUM & Session Replay Sampling</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sessionReplaySampleRate?: number | undefined;
```
